category.name: Classification
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: ICS_reference_attribute_use_format_for_display
preference.preference_description: Specifies that the reference attribute format is used to determine the size of the text field when searching in the Classification application. Valid Values: * true: the format of the dictionary attribute is used to determine the size of the text field. * false: the size of the text field of a reference attributes is always 256 characters. This is the default value.
